title: Vegetarian Nori Rolls
ingredients: ['400g (14 oz) short-grain white rice', '550ml (18 fl oz) water', '4 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 dessertspoon honey', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '75g (3 oz) firm tofu, cut into strips', '2 tablespoons rice vinegar', '4 nori seaweed sheets', '1/2 cucumber, julienned', '1/2 avocado - peeled, stone removed and julienned', '1 small carrot, julienned']
